m_displayName: ENIRIPSA - CLASSE - ETHER - EVOLUTION - Punition Eniripsa

description.fr: Inflige l'{%AT} de votre héros et soigne vos personnages d'autant \--- Lorsque vous déclenchez un SOIN : \v{value:p, +, percent} aux DÉGÂTS de ce sort. \--- Compteur SOINS : {value:Lv} {%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.en: Inflicts your hero's {%AT} and heals your characters the same amount. \--- When you trigger a HEAL:\v {value:p, +, percent} to this spell's DAMAGE. \--- HEAL Count: {value:Lv}. {%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.es: Inflige el {%AT} de tu héroe y cura a tus personajes otro tanto \--- Cuando activas una CURA: \v{value:p, +, percent} a los DAÑOS de este hechizo. \--- Contador CURAS: {value:Lv} {%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.de: Verursacht den {%AT} deines Helden als Schaden und heilt deine Charaktere in gleicher Höhe. \--- Wenn du eine HEILUNG auslöst:\v {value:p, +, percent} SCHADEN für diesen Zauber. \--- HEILUNGS-Zähler: {value:Lv} {%DestroyOnPlayed}
description.pt: Inflige o {%AT} do seu herói e cura seus personagens na mesma quantidade. \--- Quando você aciona uma CURA: \v{value:p, +, percent} aos DANOS deste feitiço. \--- Contador de CURAS: {value:Lv} {%DestroyOnPlayed}
